# Aim

This is an exercise to learn about **parallel coordinates plots**.  
Here I'll create two plots, indicating the variation of **Civil Liberties** and **Political Rights** in **European countries** across the years.

# Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

# Load and select data

Load raw data and select European countries:
```{r, message=FALSE}

raw_df <- read_csv(file = "data/raw-data.csv")
europe_df <- raw_df %>% 
  filter(Region_Name == "Europe")

```
